body:
When a ping creature such as Gelectrode is enchanted with Curiosity, using its ability to deal damage directly to an opponent doesn't allow you to draw a card.

This is in 1.22.
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Curiosity doesn't trigger on non-combat damage

content:
_From [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/) on February 01, 2012 01:32:02_

When a ping creature such as Gelectrode is enchanted with Curiosity, using its ability to deal damage directly to an opponent doesn't allow you to draw a card.

This is in 1.22.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=151_
